title: Language Education Design Based on Authentic Learning in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate advanced language proficiency required in real work environments, with real-time interactive education utilizing digital devices and online platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can perform tasks reflecting real-world language use contexts (e.g., business emails, video conferences) with 80%+ accuracy
Learners can complete language problem-solving projects through collaboration with peers in digital learning environments
Learners can improve their learning strategies using environmental analysis tools that assess language use contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
